name: Static Gaze
description:
You find yourself in a small room. The only sources of light are the large window in front of you, and the meek green light emitting from the exit sign above a locked door.

There is an assortment of puzzles and contraptions scattered throughout the room. If you solve all the puzzles, you will find the key to unlock the exit door.

Solving the puzzles themselves is simple enough. However, that is not the only thing you will need to worry about.
